resources.string: 1. Android is not an open source operating system
2. Android was originally created on top of Linux Kernel 2.6
3. ANR will occur when application is not responding
4. You can not use Log.d method to generate log messages
6. You can not modify an XML file
7. Android version number 11 will be released in 2019
8. Android was founded by Rich Miner, Nick Sears, Chris White and Andy Rubin
9. Currently, Android is owned by Apple Inc.
10. Corona, C#, PhoneGap, BASIC or C/C++ can not be used in Android development
11. Gradle is a JVM-based (Java Virtual Machine) build system
